eng: She always buys the same. — Does she?
tr: Она всегда покупает одно и то же. — Правда*?

eng: They rarely meet. — Do they?
It always works. — Does it?
Sometimes I read. — Do you?
He always chooses the same. — Does he?
tr: Он всегда выбирает одно и то же. — Неужели*?

eng: We learn Italian. — Do you?
She often do it. — Does she?
They usually begin at five. — Do they?
tr: Они обычно начинают в пять. — Точно*?

eng: He rarely goes there. — Does he?
tr: Он редко ходит туда. — Да ну*?

eng: You know me. — Do I?
She usually sleeps there. — Does she?
tr: Она обычно спит там. — Не врешь*?

eng: They rarely write SMS. — Do they?
It always burns. — Does it?
You often drink wine. — Do I?
He always gives money. — Does he?
tr: Он всегда дает деньги. — Да ну*?

eng: You often buy there. — Do we?
They sometimes meet. — Do they?
It usually works. — Does it?
You always hide here. — Do I?
He sometimes drinks. — Does he?
You rarely build. — Do we?
They often do the same. — Do they?
tr: Они часто делают то же самое. — Действительно*?

eng: You always send money. — Do I?
He goes to school. — Does he?
You rarely give money. — Do we?
He often swims here. — Does he?
You always choose the same. — Do we?
tr: Вы всегда выбираете одно и то же. — Мы? (разве)*?

eng: Never give up!
